ygData.subject: Re: ARK
ygData.msgSnippet: After you fight a few times, you will get someone. But not my money counting friends, they killed all of their enemies. Except for me, now I m with them.

"After you fight a few times, you will get someone. But not my money
counting friends, they killed all of their enemies. Except for me, now I'm
with them." Rizopas says.

"It's wonderful what a little money can do. And Doom Ice wants revenge on
Psuedo, she left him and he started going with other girls. She's weird that
way. Burning Hammer also trounced Serge, Serge wants him as well. Maybe is I
weakened that guy enough Serge might use him as an apetizer for the Preds."
Rizopas says. He never realized how good it was to talk to someone...
----- Original Message -----
From: <Alloran2@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Friday, September 22, 2000 3:10 PM
Subject: Re: ARK


>
> :::Ratchet/Sideswipe/Torca/Sharpedge:::
>
> Ratchet: I believe that the ark has no weaponry left, but you may take one
of
> my blasters.
> Sideswipe: Take my gun.  We'll defend the ark.
> ::Torca walks out of the shadows, had heard the whole thing::
> Torca: I'll help.  Take my swords.
> Ratchet: Okay, now with these weapons, the bots in that ship, and some
more
> help from the CF, i think you guys can pull it off.
> --------------------------------------------------------------------------
----
> ---------------------------------------------
> Sharpedge: I wish i had someone to get revenge on!
>
>
>
